title: BARD - Bannon's Friday Afternoon Guilty Verdict
itunes:title: BARD - Bannon's Friday Afternoon Guilty Verdict
description:
Gary and Mark continue their Sunday tradition as they discuss the Friday afternoon conviction of Steve Bannon and what his appeal may end up looking like.

Watch Beyond A Reasonable Doubt on YouTube at YouTube.com/ReasonableDoubtPodcast and subscribe while you're there.
